registryKey.description: Toggles SDK detection features
Rescan delta of AdditionalLibraryProvider, IndexableSetContributor, DirectoryIndexExcludePolicy values instead of full project.
Hide scanning progress indicator while scanning can continue in smart mode.
Dumb mode during scanning will be triggered as soon as IDE discovers this count of unindexed files.
Scanning will wait until the end of current dumb mode (if any)
Pause dumb queue (including indexing) while scanning is in progress.
Use previously stored 'indexed flag' while scanning. To store 'indexing flag' please set registry option 'indexing.disable.virtual.file.system.entry.is.file.indexed=false'.
Full scanning on startup will be skipped when possible.
Limits size of orphan dirty files queue.
Store indexing data (including IndexingStamps) in regular (false) or fast (true) attributes storage
Pause dumb queue (including indexing) while bulk VFS update is in progress.
Cache null values for pushed properties to avoid reading nulls from disk every time.

experimentalFeature.description: The Reader Mode is intended for comfortable code browsing rather than modification. It turns off warnings, show more inlay hints, enhance font presentation.

registryKey.description: Enable Code Vision performance watcher
Enable declarative inlay hints
Enables Usage highlighting under caret in dumb mode
Enables inspections in dumb mode

statusBarWidgetFactory.order: after Position, after AIAssistant, before LineSeparator

registryKey.description: Show Language Services status bar widget
Show additional info in a memory-usage bar's tooltip
Show total memory usage estimation (instead of -Xmx) info in a memory-usage bar

experimentalFeature.description: A special viewer for large files. Opens automatically for text files with size more than 20Mb (default).

registryKey.description: Action 'Insert Inline Completion Proposal Line' will also insert leading whitespaces of the next line
Amount in milliseconds to wait for completion contributors till decide whether to insert the single item
